attributes.action: Make MPs pay back expenses that are not ABSOLUTELY necessary to do their jobs properly.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: put your hands up and pay back the money you have deceived from everybody. stop hiding behind the 'rules' which allowed you to do it. you know simple right from wrong. embarrases me to be british with what you've done to the country. immigrants everywhere milking the system, and now you lot doing the same thing. absolute shame on all of you. you make us sick.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
